text: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpānassati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā
edit: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpānassati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā?

translations.transtext: 148. Monks, how was mindfulness of breathing cultivated? How is [it], having been practiced frequently, rich in result, rich in benefit?
